# Myeloma

:::info
Myeloma is also known as multiple myeloma.
:::

Incurable malignancy of plasma cells in the bone marrow, leading to:

* Bone destruction
	* Bone pain
	* Fractures
	* Bone marrow failure
		* Cytopenia
		* Immunocompromise
* Monoclonal protein production
